articles.title: AI designs new superbug-killing antibiotics for gonorrhoea and MRSA - BBC
articles.description: Two new potential drugs have been designed by AI to kill drug-resistant bacteria, in a major Massachusetts Institute of Technology study.
articles.content:
Artificial intelligence has invented two new potential antibiotics that could kill drug-resistant gonorrhoea and MRSA, researchers have revealed.
The drugs were designed atom-by-atom by the AI and k… [+4270 chars]
